title: Public Safety Fleet Solutions
metaTitle: Public Safety & Police Fleet Management System | FleetGoo
metaDesc: Enhance emergency response times and officer safety with AI-powered dashcams, real-time GPS tracking, and evidence-grade video retrieval.

blocks.title: Mission-Critical Fleet Intelligence
blocks.subtitle: Empower your command center with real-time situational awareness. From patrol cars to ambulances, ensure every second counts with our AI-driven fleet management system.

items.title: Lack of Real-time Visibility
items.desc: Traditional radio dispatching leaves command centers blind to the exact location and status of units during critical incidents.

items.title: Video Evidence Management
items.desc: Retrieving dashcam footage manually from SD cards is slow, prone to data loss, and breaks the chain of custody.

items.title: Officer & Driver Safety
items.desc: High-speed pursuits and long shifts increase accident risks. Without ADAS/DMS, minor distractions can lead to major collisions.

blocks.caption: FleetGoo End-to-End Public Safety Architecture: From Vehicle Sensors to Cloud Command Center.

items.title: Live Video Streaming
items.desc: Stream up to 4 channels of HD video from any vehicle in real-time over 4G LTE. See what your officers see instantly.

items.title: Evidence Locking
items.desc: Automatically upload video clips to the cloud when sirens are activated, ensuring critical evidence is never lost.

items.title: Precision GPS Dispatch
items.desc: Identify the nearest available unit to an incident with sub-meter accuracy to significantly reduce response times.

items.title: Driver Behavior Analysis
items.desc: Monitor harsh braking, cornering, and speeding. Use data to train officers for safer emergency driving.

items.title: Two-Way Audio
items.desc: Direct voice communication between dispatch and the vehicle cabin, independent of radio frequencies.

items.title: Health Monitoring
items.desc: Connect to vehicle CAN bus (OBDII) to monitor engine health, fuel levels, and battery status remotely.

items.title: AI-Powered Collision Avoidance (ADAS)
items.desc: Our advanced Mobileye-compatible ADAS system scans the road ahead. It warns drivers of potential forward collisions, lane departures, and pedestrians in real-time, giving them precious seconds to react.

items.title: Secure Chain of Custody
items.desc: Video files are watermarked and encrypted from the moment of capture. Our cloud platform maintains a strict audit log of who accessed or downloaded footage, ensuring admissibility in court.

items.title: 6-CH Display
items.desc: 非常NB的AI 显示器，完美解决偷油、偷货的问题
